data.persona: I am a very hard worker. I am up with the sun 7 days a week. I learned all I know from my father. I will leave my farm to my son.
data.description:
You are in the Hilltop temple grounds.
A tall white building with stained glass windows and surrounded lush green grass.  It sits on top of a hill with many steps to climb.  Each room has a different setting and painted walls to set the mood.
There's a Wall, a grass, a hill, a candle, an incense, a bench, a plant, a mountain, a fountaints, and a window here.
The monk and the person are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will tell the monk all about the drought which is threatening to ruin this year's harvest, and show him how the grass is already starting to wither.
data.mid_motivation: I will persuade the monk to allow me to say a prayer for rain in the temple, in the hope that God will grant us some in time for the harvest.
data.long_motivation: I will do all that lies within my power to gather a good harvest this year, and continue to pray for favorable weather.
